languages.text: Заккари Вайс, хормейстер астропатов, обратил стыд и раскаяние в железную цепь, которой связал свою душу. Холодный и отстраненный, он более никогда не брал себе личных учеников и не сближался с подчиненными. Посвятив себя безукоризненной службе, он с неизменным успехом исполнял приказы Лорд-капитана и сумел пережить не менее семи инцидентов, полностью уничтожавших астропатический хор.

Zacchary Weisz, Choirmaster of the Astropaths, turned his shame and repentance into an iron chain binding his soul. Cold and detached, he would never again take a personal apprentice or become close with a subordinate. He dedicated himself to impeccable service, unfailingly carrying out the Lord Captain's orders and surviving at least seven incidents that wiped out the entire Astropathic Choir.

languages.text: Zacchary Weisz, der Chormeister der Astropathen, verwandelte seine Scham und Reue in eine eiserne Kette, die seine Seele band. Kalt und gleichgültig würde er nie wieder einen persönlichen Schüler annehmen oder einem Untergebenen nahekommen. Er widmete sich seinem Dienst, führte fehlerlos die Befehle des Lord Captains aus und überlebte mindestens sieben Zwischenfälle, die den gesamten Astropathischen Chor auslöschten.
languages.original_text: Zacchary Weisz, Choirmaster of the Astropaths, turned his shame and repentance into an iron chain binding his soul. Cold and detached, he would never again take a personal apprentice or become close with a subordinate. He dedicated himself to impeccable service, unfailingly carrying out the Lord Captain's orders and surviving at least seven incidents that wiped out the entire Astropathic Choir.

Kalt und gleichgültig würde er nie wieder einen persönlichen Schüler annehmen oder einem Untergebenen nahekommen. Er widmete sich seinem Dienst, führte fehlerlos die Befehle des Lord Captains aus und überlebte mindestens sieben Zwischenfälle, die den gesamten Astropathischen Chor auslöschten.

languages.text: Le maître du chœur astropathique Zacchary Weisz fit de sa honte et de ses remords une chaîne d'acier enserrant son âme. Retranché dans sa froideur et son détachement, il renonça définitivement à prendre de nouveaux apprentis sous son aile et à nouer des liens avec ses subordonnés. Il se dévoua corps et âme à son devoir, exécutant à la lettre les ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, et survécut à pas moins de sept incidents qui décimèrent l'ensemble du chœur astropathique.
languages.original_text: Zacchary Weisz, Choirmaster of the Astropaths, turned his shame and repentance into an iron chain binding his soul. Cold and detached, he would never again take a personal apprentice or become close with a subordinate. He dedicated himself to impeccable service, unfailingly carrying out the Lord Captain's orders and surviving at least seven incidents that wiped out the entire Astropathic Choir.

Retranché dans sa froideur et son détachement, il renonça définitivement à prendre de nouveaux apprentis sous son aile et à nouer des liens avec ses subordonnés. Il se dévoua corps et âme à son devoir, exécutant à la lettre les ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, et survécut à pas moins de sept incidents qui décimèrent l'ensemble du chœur astropathique.

languages.text: Zacchary Weisz, maestro del Coro de Astrópatas, convirtió su vergüenza y arrepentimiento en una cadena de hierro que ataba su alma. Frío y distante, nunca aceptó otro aprendiz ni se aproximó a un subordinado. Se dedicó enteramente a ofrecer un servicio impecable, ejecutando las órdenes de su Lord Capitán sin descanso y sobreviviendo a al menos siete incidentes que acabaron con el resto del Coro de Astrópatas.
languages.original_text: Zacchary Weisz, Choirmaster of the Astropaths, turned his shame and repentance into an iron chain binding his soul. Cold and detached, he would never again take a personal apprentice or become close with a subordinate. He dedicated himself to impeccable service, unfailingly carrying out the Lord Captain's orders and surviving at least seven incidents that wiped out the entire Astropathic Choir.

Frío y distante, nunca aceptó otro aprendiz ni se aproximó a un subordinado. languages.text: 感応通信聖歌隊のクワイアーマスターであるザッカリー・ワイズは、己の恥辱と悔恨の熱を鉄の鎖に変えて、その魂を縛り付けた。冷徹かつ冷淡になった彼は、二度と個人的に弟子を取ることも、部下と親しくなることもないだろう。彼は完全に職務に身を捧げ、ロード・キャプテンの命令を忠実にこなし、感応通信聖歌隊を全滅させるレベルの事件を、少なくとも7回生き延びている。
languages.original_text: Zacchary Weisz, Choirmaster of the Astropaths, turned his shame and repentance into an iron chain binding his soul. Cold and detached, he would never again take a personal apprentice or become close with a subordinate. He dedicated himself to impeccable service, unfailingly carrying out the Lord Captain's orders and surviving at least seven incidents that wiped out the entire Astropathic Choir.

traits.locale_text: 感応通信聖歌隊のクワイアーマスターであるザッカリー・ワイズは、己の恥辱と悔恨の熱を鉄の鎖に変えて、その魂を縛り付けた。冷徹かつ冷淡になった彼は、二度と個人的に弟子を取ることも、部下と親しくなることもないだろう。彼は完全に職務に身を捧げ、ロード・キャプテンの命令を忠実にこなし、感応通信聖歌隊を全滅させるレベルの事件を、少なくとも7回生き延びている。

languages.text: 扎卡里·威茨，星语唱诗班的唱诗大师，将他的耻辱与忏悔变成了束缚灵魂的锁链。他变得冷漠而孤傲，再也不收任何学徒，也不再和任何下属亲近。他认认真真地提供毫无瑕疵的服务，始终如一地执行行商浪人的命令，还经历了至少七次将整个星语唱诗班彻底摧毁的严重事故，每一次都存活了下来。
languages.original_text: Zacchary Weisz, Choirmaster of the Astropaths, turned his shame and repentance into an iron chain binding his soul. Cold and detached, he would never again take a personal apprentice or become close with a subordinate. He dedicated himself to impeccable service, unfailingly carrying out the Lord Captain's orders and surviving at least seven incidents that wiped out the entire Astropathic Choir.

languages.text: Astropatların Koro Şefi olan Zacchary Weisz, utancı ve kefaretini ruhunu bağlayan demirden bir zincire çevirdi. Soğuk ve mesafeli bir hayat süren Weisz, bir daha ne bir çırak edindi ne de astlarıyla yakın ilişki kurdu. Kendini kusursuz şekilde hizmet etmeye adayarak Lord Kaptan'ın emirlerini eksiksiz yerine getirdi ve tüm Astropatik Koro'yu ortadan kaldıran en az yedi kazadan sağ çıkmayı başardı.
languages.original_text: Zacchary Weisz, Choirmaster of the Astropaths, turned his shame and repentance into an iron chain binding his soul. Cold and detached, he would never again take a personal apprentice or become close with a subordinate. He dedicated himself to impeccable service, unfailingly carrying out the Lord Captain's orders and surviving at least seven incidents that wiped out the entire Astropathic Choir.
